sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"害怕的，怕的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: afraid, fearful, awful, dreadful, frightful, terrible, horrible, terrific, appalling
means: afraid ：指由于胆小或怯懦而不敢说或做某事。
fearful ：普通用词，既指外界情况变化而引起的恐惧，又指来自内心的害怕与焦虑。
awful ：指威严得令人害怕或敬畏，有一定的感情色彩。
dreadful ：指使人非常恐惧，毛骨悚然，也使人感到讨厌而退缩。
frightful ：指使人陷入短暂的惊恐或产生毛骨悚然的感觉。
terrible ：侧重指给人以长久的惊骇，极端的恐怖，令人难以忍受。
horrible ：指因骇人听闻的丑恶而令人毛骨悚然，着重厌恶的成分多于害怕。
terrific ：多指外表、形状或力量等的可怕。
appalling ：指既令害怕又使人惊异、胆寒。

sentence.Network_en: "It sounds the most fearful hard work," Sybil said later.
sentence.Network_cn: “这听起来是极为令人生畏的艰苦工作。”西比尔后来说。

sentence.Network_en: I had often been very fearful, very angry, and very isolated.
sentence.Network_cn: 我以前经常感到非常恐惧，非常愤怒，非常孤独。

sentence.Network_en: Our artillery opened up and we heard a fearful wailing and screeching.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的炮弹一发，便听到可怕的哀号声和尖叫声。

entry.def: If you are fearful of something, you are afraid of it.

example.ex: Bankers were fearful of a world banking crisis...
example.tran: 银行家们害怕会发生一场全球银行业危机。

example.ex: I had often been very fearful, very angry, and very isolated.
example.tran: 我以前经常感到非常恐惧，非常愤怒，非常孤独。

entry.def: You use fearful to emphasize how serious or bad a situation is.

example.ex: The region is in a fearful recession.
example.tran: 该地区处于严重的经济衰退中。

example.ex: ...the fearful consequences which might flow from unilateral military moves.
example.tran: 单方面军事行动可能造成的可怕后果

entry.def: Fearful is used to emphasize that something is very bad.

example.ex: You gave me a fearful shock!
'It sounds the most fearful hard work,' Sybil said later.
example.tran: “这听起来是极为令人生畏的艰苦工作。”西比尔后来说。

means.word_mean: 1. causing fear or dread or terror;

sentences.sentence: "a career or vengeance so direful that London was shocked"
"polio is no longer the dreaded disease it once was"

means.word_mean: 2. lacking courage; ignobly timid and faint-hearted;

sentences.sentence: "cowardly dogs, ye will not aid me then"- P.B.Shelley

means.word_mean: 4. timid by nature or revealing timidity;

sentences.sentence: "cast fearful glances at the large dog"

Sentence.sentence: The publisher, fearful of being cheated, forced her to submit to his scholarly examination by a board of educated men, including the colonial governor.

sentences.en: The nurse on duty was fearful that the patient should get worse.
sentences.cn: 值班的护士担心病人的病情会恶化。

sentences.en: They were fearful of tackling him.
I have ever witnessed a fearful accident.
sentences.cn: 我曾目睹一场可怕的事故。

sentences.en: What a fearful waste of time!

jushi.english: I have ever witnessed a fearful accident.
jushi.chinese: 我曾目睹一场可怕的事故。

jushi.english: What a fearful waste of time!
She was fearful of wakening the baby.
